# Question 1

```{r}
x <- list(2, 4, 5, 9, 1)
y <- list(8, 7, 2, 8, 3)
z <- list(1, 8, 5, 4, 2)
```

```{r}
pmap_dbl(list(x, y, z), function (x, y, z) (x + y + z)^2)
```

# Question 2

```{r}
tribble( ~Student, ~Gender, ~Salary,
"John", "Male", 65000,
"Alice", "Female", 73000,
"Juan", "Male", 66000,
"Beth", "Female", 71500,
"Denise", "Female", 82000
) -> table
table
```
```{r}
table %>%
  pmap_chr(~str_glue("{..1} who is {..2}, has a salary that is {..3} dollars per year."))
```
